muel0017
[QUOTE=Goop;12170317]Weak stats all around. I'd probably just hide him in a corner somewhere for that trait to pump up the kree soliders, for that purpose he's quite good. Beyond that he's not much of an attacker and very easy to kill.[/QUOTE] Keep him close to a sidekick for the leadership and TA. Can use as an extra attacker if needed. Tucking him in a corner would be a bad way to play him.
